name: Saurian Staff Test Run: Cruise Ship
desc:
When the saurian staff have finished preparing, you can ring the bell to instruct them to activate the wave machine. The Chompy Chompy Shark will rise to the surface at intervals. Carefully time the waves to guide the cruise ship through the shark's mouth and increase compatibility with the playtesters.
When the cruise ship reaches its destination, if the testers' compatibility is sufficiently high, the facility's trial run will be viewed as a success!
